import InformationListWrapper from'./informationList.style';/*
* ==================== InformationList 組件說明 ====================
* InformationList 組件用於 2 欄的條列內容
* ==================== InformationList 可傳參數 ====================
* 1. title -> 顯示左側之標題文字
* 2. content -> 顯示於右側內容文字，與標題同水平高度
* 3. caption -> 顯示於左側內容文字下方的備註文字
* 4. remark -> 顯示於右側內容文字下方的備註文字
* 5. extra -> 顯示於右側內容文字之內
* 6. textColor -> content顏色： text-dark | text-primary
* */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var InformationList=function InformationList(_ref){var title=_ref.title,content=_ref.content,caption=_ref.caption,remark=_ref.remark,extra=_ref.extra,_ref$textColor=_ref.textColor,textColor=_ref$textColor===void 0?'text-dark':_ref$textColor;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(InformationListWrapper,{children:[!remark&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex text-remark"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex text-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray text-nowrap",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"".concat(textColor," text-align-end"),children:[content,extra&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-green",children:extra})]})]}),remark&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex text-remark",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-light",children:caption}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-light",children:remark})]})]});};export default InformationList;
